amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Weatherization Assistance Program by $13 million and reduces Strategic Petroleum Reserve funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 14 and printed in the Congressional Record. to increase funding for the Weatherization Assistance Program by $13 million and reduce Strategic Petroleum Reserve funding accordingly.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 180 (Roll no. 284).
